example.eg: He led an interesting life.
Scientists were surprised to discover life at the bottom of the sea.
example.egtrans: 科学家发现海底还有生物，大为惊奇。

example.eg: Do you think there is intelligent life on other planets?
example.egtrans: 你觉得其他星球上有生命吗？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 生命，生物, 生命，生存

example.eg: This battery should have a life of 20 hours.
example.egtrans: 这个电池的使用寿命只有20小时。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 保质期, 有效期, 使用寿命

example.eg: The children are so full of life.
example.egtrans: 孩子们可真是充满活力。

example.eg: Twenty lives were lost in the bombing.
example.egtrans: 有二十人在轰炸中丧生。

example.eg: My grandma told me all about her life as a nurse during the war.
example.egtrans: 祖母将战争期间自己当护士的全部经历都告诉了我。

example.eg: The academic wrote an excellent life of Shakespeare.
example.egtrans: 这名学者为莎士比亚撰写了一本精彩的传记。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 传记, 生活经历, 生平事迹

example.eg: That actress really gives life to the role.
The judge sentenced him to life.
I love my boy.  He is my life.

dsense.name: actuarial table, actuarial life table, life table

example.eg: I was born in Manchester, and I've lived here all my life.

dsense.name: all the days of your life
the autumn of your life, your autumn years

example.eg: In the autumn of his life, Charles was no longer interested in his former hobbies.

dsense.name: bane, bane of your life, bane of your existence
dsense.guideword: figurative (source of annoyance) (造成不快的源头)

example.eg: My computer's crashed again; technology is the bane of my life!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 电池寿命, 电池使用时间

dsense.name: be the life and soul of [sth], be the heart and soul of [sth]
dsense.guideword: figurative (be the source of animation, vitality)

example.eg: The paramedics breathed life into the accident victim.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 给予生气, 赋予活力

example.eg: Hiring Edie with her fresh new ideas will breathe new life into this company.
The idea, once rejected, has been brought back to life by proponents.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 恢复，重新开展，重新引入

example.eg: The party was boring until the band started playing and brought it to life.
A good movie adaptation really brings the characters to life.
A fairy brought the puppet Pinocchio to life.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 赋予...生命, 让...活过来

dsense.name: the change, the change of life

example.eg: Weight gain is common among women who are going through the change.
I prefer the high energy of city life to the calm of the country.
It's surprising how much I come to life after a short nap.

dsense.name: come to life
dsense.guideword: figurative (art, theatre: be convincing) (比喻，艺术、戏剧等)

example.eg: His stories seem to come to life as he tells them with such passion.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 乡村生活, 田园生活

example.eg: Some people only practice their religion on holidays, while for others it's a part of their daily life.
example.egtrans: 许多人只在假期从事宗教活动，然而对于其他人则是他们的日常生活的一部分。

example.eg: I want to depart this life at the time and in the manner of my choosing.
example.egtrans: 我想按自己选择的时间和方式离开这个人世间。

example.eg: Jeremy devoted his life to a vain cause.
She spent her early life in India, but moved to Britain as a teenager.
The search for the elixir of life dates back thousands of years.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 长寿仙丹, 长生不老药

example.eg: A hospice is often the best place for end-of-life care.
The light bulb has an estimated life of 64 hours.
Christians believe that, through faith and good works, they can attain eternal life with God.
The teacher showed the students how they use math in everyday life.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 生活现实，无法改变的事实

example.eg: If the parents don't teach their children the facts of life the school system will have to do it.
He feared for his life when the robber drew a gun.
Marriage is a commitment for life.
I cannot for the life of me remember my next-door neighbour's name.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 无论如何, 即使要了我的命

example.eg: He's nearly 80 but still full of life and with an eye for the ladies.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 充满活力的, 充满生机的

example.eg: I hope to come back as a house cat in a future life.
When I told them I was translating the Bible into Vulcan they all said “Get a life!”

trans_examp.trans_cn: 找点别的事情做吧！, 别那么无聊！, 找点正经事情来做吧！

example.eg: He provides just enough description to give life to his characters.
example.egtrans: 他的描写恰到好处，让他笔下的人物栩栩如生。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 赋予…生机, 赋予…活力

example.eg: He's living the good life on his yacht in the Mediterranean.
The half-life of uranium-238 is about 4.47 billion years.
The time taken to repay half the mortgage debt is referred to here as the half-life of the mortgage.
Working in the coal mines was a hard life.

dsense.name: healthy lifestyle, healthy life-style, healthy life style

example.eg: More people are beginning to realize that a healthy lifestyle can prevent diabetes.
So far there is no evidence of human life on Mars.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 人类存在, 人类生命

dsense.name: in the prime of life, in the prime of your life, in your prime

trans_examp.trans_cn: 处于人生的巅峰时期，处于人生中最好的年华, 年富力强

example.eg: The first-aider gave the patient the kiss of life.
She's a larger-than-life character who is usually the centre of attention.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 非常引人注目的, 让人印象深刻的, 非常丰富多彩的

example.eg: Some mothers would lay down their lives for their children.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 为...献出生命, 为...拼上性命

example.eg: People with young children are more likely to buy life assurance.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 人寿保险, 人寿险, 寿险

dsense.name: life class, also US: life drawing class, also UK: life-drawing class

trans_examp.trans_cn: 人体写生课, 人体素描课

example.eg: The students learned about the life cycle of a butterfly.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 人体写生, 人体素描

dsense.name: life expectancy
dsense.guideword: (age one is expected to live to)

example.eg: The average life expectancy for a man in the US is about 75 years.
example.egtrans: 在美国，一名男性的平均寿命大约是75年。

example.eg: This site is full of handy life hacks, such as how to fold a shirt in under three seconds.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 生活小窍门, 生活小智慧
人生经历, 生平遭遇

example.eg: After being convicted of murder, he was sentenced to life imprisonment.
I bought life insurance to help my family if something happens to me.
example.egtrans: 我买了一份人寿保险，如果我出了什么事，好帮助我的家人。

dsense.name: life jacket, life vest, life preserver, lifesaver, life saver

example.eg: Some of the crewmen weren't wearing life jackets.  When the ship hit the rocks we were all ordered to put on our life jackets.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 生活管理技能，人生管理技能

dsense.name: life of the party
dsense.guideword: informal, figurative (most lively, outgoing person) (非正式用语，比喻)

example.eg: I love hanging out with Mark – he's the life of the party.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 聚会的灵魂人物，聚会中最活跃的人物

dsense.name: life saver, lifesaver
dsense.guideword: figurative, informal ([sb], [sth] helpful in emergency) (比喻)

example.eg: Thank you so much for the loan! You're a life saver!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 救命恩人, 救急的人或事物, 毕生积蓄，一生的积蓄

example.eg: He wants to study the life sciences and become a cancer researcher.
My brother's serving a life sentence for kidnapping.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 终身监禁, 无期徒刑
生活技能, 生存技能

example.eg: There are ethical questions associated with keeping a person on life support.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 生平, 生活经历, 维持生命的设备, 生命维持设备

dsense.name: life vest, life jacket, also US: life preserver

example.eg: Boats are required to have enough life vests for all the passengers.  Under boating regulations, you must wear a life jacket when out fishing.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 生死攸关的, 重大的

example.eg: Volunteering in Central America was a life-changing experience for me.
example.egtrans: 在中美洲的志愿者生活对我来说是一段改变人生的经历。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 提高生活质量的，增加生活乐趣的
生死攸关的，生死存亡的
生死攸关的，生死存亡的, 关系重大的
